alert.note: Alert for Medina; Summit (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 5:08PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Gusty winds will impact portions of Medina, Summit and southern Lorain Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 508 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking gusty winds along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Euclid to near Elyria to near Wakeman to near Bellevue. Movement was south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Akron, Medina, Cuyahoga Falls, Strongsville, Brunswick, North Royalton, Barberton, Green, Solon, Hudson, Wadsworth, Twinsburg, Tallmadge, Macedonia, Grafton, Rittman, Wellington, Mogadore, Lodi and Chippewa Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for north central and northeastern Ohio.
